description: Core simulations for climate model intercomparison.
keywords: climate sensitivity, historical reference, control simulations, unforced variability, DECK
long_name: Diagnosis, Evaluation, and Characterization of Klima (Climate)
label: DECK
rationale: To maintain continuity and help document basic characteristics of models across different phases of CMIP. To investigate differences in the model's response to increasing atmospheric CO2.
